summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Live Code Mentor MVP. All backend APIs (8/8) and frontend features are fully functional. Code analysis, teaching overlays, English chat, and image upload features work perfectly with AI integration.
passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints (health, analyze-code, generate-teaching, generate-deeper-explanation, generate-visual-diagram, evaluate-answer, english-chat, analyze-image)
Mode switcher between Code Learning and English Learning
Monaco code editor with language selection (Python, JavaScript, etc.)
Code analysis with bug detection and severity badges
Teaching overlay with concept explanations and common mistakes
Show More functionality with deeper explanations and SVG diagrams
Check understanding feature with student answer evaluation
English chat with AI responses and intent detection (Question, Practice, Conversation)
Grammar corrections display in chat responses
Image upload modal with task type selection
All UI components are interactive and responsive
AI integration with Gemini 3 Flash working properly
